metadata.title: Taxi Wallet – Vegan Material, Kiss from Gustav Klimt – A Simple, Compact, Front Pocket, Folding Wallet, that holds Cards, Coins, Bills, ID – for Men & Women
features: ♥ THE ONE AND ONLY TAXI WALLET by Alicia Klein. The Taxi Wallet has been a treasured American brand since 1987.
♥ MINIMIZE THE CLUTTER - Downsize your wallet; simplify your life. It all adds up. Measuring 4" x 3.5" x .5", the Taxi Wallet is compact and easily accommodates 6+ cards, coins, bills and ID.
♥ ONE WORLD ONE WALLET - For over 30 years, the Taxi Wallet has enjoyed an enormously broad appeal with men, women, young, old, hip, square, posh, US, UK, JAPAN, EU, CANADA, etc.

♥ BUILT TO LAST - You want a wallet that is going to look great today and for a long, long time, too. We deliver that by focusing on premium construction and premier materials. We are after your 5-Stars! Materials: cowhide leather or man-made fabrics.
♥ OUR COMMITMENT – Same as it’s always been. We’ll deliver a great product, and should something go wrong, we’ll fix it.
description: ✔A Proven Winner - Since 1987, thousands of people have made the TAXI WALLET their go-to wallet. We are especially grateful to all of our long-time customers. We appreciate that you have enjoyed using the TAXI WALLET for so many years and we know that many of you have bought them as gifts throughout the years. Thank you, again!
✔Compact Size - Measuring 4" x 3.5" x 0.5" it easily fits into a front pocket or a small bag.

✔Downsize, Minimize, Simplify - Just carry the basics...a few bills, coins, 6+ cards, and an ID. One simple design yet the TAXI WALLET is often considered - a billfold, a two-fold, a credit card wallet, a wallet for coins, a Euros wallet, 10,000 Yen note wallet, a front pocket wallet, a tiny bag wallet, a minimalist travel wallet....

✔Construction and Materials - Choose the TAXI WALLET because it will look fabulous and function wonderfully for a long time. We focus on quality construction and materials, and that's why our wallets wear so beautifully and for so long.
Don't worry about it. The TAXI WALLET will wear beautifully without any special care. Use it and enjoy it! Really.

We created the Taxi Wallet in 1987 and we are located on the Central Coast of California. Since our plan is to stick around another 30+ years, your complete satisfaction is our number one goal.  Should we fall short of a 5-STAR rating, please let us know what we need to do to earn those extra stars.

During normal business hours (PST), we are here to handle your questions. If your call is after hours, we’ll get back to you the following day. Most of us are now working remotely so we *may* need an extra day.
TAXI WALLET, OWL Recycled, KITxCHANGE and ALICIA KLEIN are registered trademarks and belong to a family of brands from ALICIA KLEIN.
